synopsis.text: Based on the provided synopses, this anime is set during the last years of China's Sui dynasty in the 7th century AD, a time of political turmoil and unrest. The story follows Ma Dao, a skilled swordsman and escort (bounty hunter) who travels alone across the western desert regions of China. He is on a mission to repay a debt to a man named Mo, who cared for Ma Dao and his child Xiao Qi. On his return journey, Ma Dao encounters victims of terrifying man-eating demons known as "rakshasa" that are spreading terror throughout the land. He gets caught up in the increasing bloodshed and chaos overtaking the country. Despite his formidable fighting abilities, Ma Dao eventually falls prey to the rakshasa. The underlying plot seems to involve political conspiracies and a mysterious organization aiming to overthrow the ruthless Sui regime. Ma Dao becomes an unwitting participant in events that determine the fate of the empire during this volatile period. Overall, this anime appears to be an action-packed historical fantasy depicting a lone warrior's dramatic adventures in a land plagued by political instability and supernatural threats. The high stakes action and rich setting should captivate viewers interested in Chinese legends.
